miriam_quotes.punchline: Alam niyo ba ang alamat ng baboy? Minsan sa sobrang galit ko, sinuntok ko sa ilong ang isang elepante. Hindi na lumaki ang mga anak nya. Sa kanya nag-umpisa ang kauna-unahang baboy.

miriam_quotes.setup:
Student: Ma'am, kamusta po ang grades ko?
Professor:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Aba, iha, kasing-ganda ng buhok mo! Parang bagong rebond. Bagsak na bagsak!

miriam_quotes.setup: Political correctness for teenage students:
miriam_quotes.punchline: No one fails a class anymore; they're merely 'passing impaired.'
You don't have detention; you're just one of the 'exit delayed.'
Your bedroom isn't cluttered; it's just 'passage restrictive.'
These days, a student isn't lazy; he's 'energetically declined.'
Your locker isn't overflowing with junk; it's just 'closure prohibitive.'
Kids don't get grounded anymore; they merely hit 'social speedbumps.'
Your homework isn't missing; it's just having an 'out-of-notebook experience.'
You're not sleeping in class; you're 'rationing consciousness.'
You're not late; you just have a 'rescheduled arrival time.'

miriam_quotes.setup: Paano mo sasabihin sa kausap mong babae na mukha siyang lalaki nang hindi siya masasaktan?
miriam_quotes.punchline: Ganito: Uy ang kyut-lyut mo naman! Kamukhang-kamukha ka ng daddy mo!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Sa isang examination
Student: Ma'am, puwedeng gumamit ng liquid paper?
Teacher:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Ang kulit naman! Sinabi nang pad paper lang eh.

miriam_quotes.setup:
Pagkatapos ng examination
Teacher:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Okay, time is up. One, two, three. Come your papers to me!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Pagkatapos ng klase
Teacher to students:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Okay class, it's time to go home. Form a line and pass out slowly.

miriam_quotes.setup: Wrong word usages:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Laity — Hometown ni Imelda Marcos ang laity.
Mention — Ang laki ng bahay nila, parang mention.
Punctuation — Sabi ng isang bata, 'Daddy, pasukan na next week. Kailangan ko po ng punctuation.'
Tenacious — Before playing tennis I have to put on my tenacious.
Curtain and Kitchen — Aray! Huwag mo kong curtain. Masa-kitchen.

miriam_quotes.setup: Subukan natin ang talino ninyo. Use the word 'ANYONE' in a sentence.
miriam_quotes.punchline: Answer: 'Nasaan na kayo? Bakit niyo ako ANYONE?'

miriam_quotes.setup: I heard one of the questions in the last bar exams went like this: Should Santa Claus be considered a criminal?
miriam_quotes.punchline: The answer is yes. He is liable for crimes such as illegal surveillance, unfair labor practices, animal abuse, and breaking and entering.
Ano ang sabi ng anak na caterpillar sa tatay caterpillar? 'Tay, bilhan mo ako ng sapatos!'

miriam_quotes.setup:
Ano ang sabi ng anak na caterpillar sa tatay caterpillar? 'Tay, bilhan mo ako ng sapatos!'
Sumagot ang tatay caterpillar:
miriam_quotes.punchline: 'Sipain kita d'yan e!'

miriam_quotes.setup: Paano mo sasabihin sa classmate mo na bungi-bungi ang ngipin niya nang hindi siya magagalit?
miriam_quotes.punchline: Ganito: Wow, classmate, ang ganda naman ng ngipin mo! Para silang nag-eexam, one seat apart!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Boss: Why do you think we should hire you?
John: Kasi po bago pa lang po ako kaya wala pa po akong sungay.
Boss: In English, please.
John:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Ah, uhm, well you see I'm brand new so I'm not yet horny.

miriam_quotes.setup:
Teacher: Use the word 'beautiful' in a sentence.
Student: 'My teacher is beautiful, isn't she?'
Teacher: Thank you, it's very flattering. Now, translate it in Tagalog.
Student:
miriam_quotes.punchline: 'Ang guro ko ay maganda, maganda nga ba?'

miriam_quotes.setup:
Gardo: Pedro, nahirapan ka ba sa questions sa exam?
Pedro:
miriam_quotes.punchline:
Hindi naman!
Cardo: Ang galing mo naman!
Pedro: Nahirapan ako sa answers!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Teacher: Ano ang similarity nina Jose Rizal, Andres Bonifacio, at Ninoy Aquino?
Student:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Lahat sila, namatay ng holiday!
Madaling magkasakit ang mga sexy; ang mga crush ng bayan; ang ma-appeal at henyo; ang kind, thoughtful, smart, sweet, and malakas ang karisma. Bigla yatang sumama ng pakiramdam ko, ah.
Hindi lahat ng nananalo ay magagaling dahil may nandadaya.
Hindi lahat ng matalino ay mataas ang grades dahil may nangongopya.
Hindi lahat ng artista ay sexy dahil di naman ako artista, sexy lang talaga.

miriam_quotes.setup: Alam niyo ba ang alamat ng giraffe?
miriam_quotes.punchline: Minsan sa sobrang galit ko, binigyan ko ng uppercut ang isang kabayo. Sa kanya nag-umpisa ang kauna-unahang giraffe.
I think divorce should be available to people who become homicidal at the sight of each other.

miriam_quotes.setup: A survey was conducted to find out what is the first thing men look at when a beautiful woman passes by.
miriam_quotes.punchline: But—100% of married men said they first look at their wives to check if they are looking at them.
Men are like horoscopes, they always tell you what to do and are usually wrong.
A smart wife is one who makes sure she spends so much that her husband can't afford another woman.
It is very important that you should choose the person you will marry and stay with that person. There are many people now who believe in serial love, loving one person after another.
I don't think that is good for our mental health. I think we should get it over with. It's like measles, you know. You only get it once in your lifetime and you are immune forever.
I am very happy to say that is what happened to me. I am completely immune to any temptation. All men who have passed my life after I got married might as well have been sticks of furniture.
After a hard day's work, it's great to come home and have someone to yell at, at the top of my lungs.
I don't smoke, I don't drink, I don't commit adultery. I only tell lies to my husband.
When I got married, I noticed immediately that there seems to be a rivalry between the egos of two people. So, if you just kill your ego, there's no problem.
To fight with someone who's going to be with you for the rest of your life is so counterproductive.
So I just said to my husband on our honeymoon, 'I'll go my way, and you'll go my way.'
There is a recent study that more than 60 percent of married men in Metro Manila are unfaithful to their wives. This is because the remaining 40 percent bring their mistresses to the provinces.

miriam_quotes.setup: Five tips for a happy man's life:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Siguraduhin na hindi magkakakilala ang apat na babaeng iyon.

miriam_quotes.setup:
A couple is lying in bed.
The man says: 'Right now, for this Women's Day, I am going to make you the happiest woman in the world!'
The woman says:
miriam_quotes.punchline: 'Oh dear, I will miss you!'
After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin—they can't face each other but they still stay together.
Marriage is when a man and a woman become as one. The trouble starts when they try to decide which one.
Before marriage, a man will lie awake all night thinking about something she said. After marriage, he will fall asleep before she finishes talking.
They say when a man holds a woman's hand before marriage, that is love. After marriage, that is self-defense.

miriam_quotes.setup:
Husband: Love, may taning na ang buhay ko. Huling gabi ko na 'to, let's make love.
Wife:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Heh, tumigil ka nga! Maaga pa akong gigising bukas, buti ikaw, hindi na!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Husband: Parati na lang tayo nag-aaway! Maghiwalay na lang tayo!
Wife: Sige, maghati tayo ng mga anak!
Husband:
miriam_quotes.punchline:
Akin ang mga guwapo at maganda!
Wife: 'Sus! Pinili pa yung hindi kanya!

miriam_quotes.setup: Ano sa Tagalog ang: 'Eat All You Can, don't be shy, feel at home!'
miriam_quotes.punchline: Sagot: 'Kain lang kayo ng kain, walang hiya kayo, pakiramdam nyo bahay nyo to!'

miriam_quotes.setup: Advantage at disadvantage ng may-asawa:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Disadvantage: Pag ayaw mo na, andiyan pa rin!

miriam_quotes.setup:
At a cocktail party, one woman said to another, 'Aren't you wearing your wedding ring on the wrong finger?'
The other woman replied:
miriam_quotes.punchline: 'Yes, I am. I married the wrong man.'
Marriage: a community consisting of a master, a mistress, and two slaves, making in all, two.

miriam_quotes.setup: When the husband says, 'Ako ang tigas sa amin.'
miriam_quotes.punchline: He really means: 'Ako ang tigas-saing ng kanin, tigas-sampay ng labada, tigas-sama sa palengke, at tigas-sundo sa eskwela ng mga bata.'

miriam_quotes.setup: When the husband says: 'Gagawin ko kahit ayaw ng Misis ko.'
miriam_quotes.punchline: He really means, 'Gagawin kong maghugas ng pinggan kung ayaw niya, gagawin kong maglaba kung ayaw niya.'

miriam_quotes.setup: When the husband says, 'Kapag sinabi kong hiwalay, HIWALAY!'
miriam_quotes.punchline: He really means, 'Hiniwalay ko na ang puti sa de-kolor at baka kumupas ang labada.'

miriam_quotes.setup: When the husband says, 'Lahat ng utos ko ay pasigaw.'
miriam_quotes.punchline: He really means, 'Hoy, pakibilisan mo naman iyang kape, please, at giniginaw na ako dito sa labahan!'

miriam_quotes.setup:
Adik sa droga: Payag ka na bang magpakasal sa akin?
Babae: Oo, pero ok lang ba sa iyo kung meron akong past?
Adik:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Ok lang, wala naman akong future eh!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Wife: Ibili mo naman ako ng bagong bra.
Husband: 'Wag ka na mag-bra, maliit naman boobs mo, eh.
Wife:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Eh, bakit ikaw, nagbi-brief?

miriam_quotes.setup:
Husband says: When I'm gone you'll never find another man like me.
Wife replied:
miriam_quotes.punchline: What makes you think I'd want another man like you?!

miriam_quotes.setup:
Wife: My husband and I have what he calls Olympic sex.
Friend: Wow, you must be having a terrific sex life!
Wife:
miriam_quotes.punchline: Not really. It only happens once in 4 years.

miriam_quotes.setup:
May isang husband na proud na proud na may anim na anak silang mag-asawa...
Nang minsan pagkatapos nilang kumain sa isang mataong restaurant, malakas na sinabi ng husband sa wife niya, 'Umuwi na tayo, Mother of Six!'
Sumagot din nang malakas ang wife,
miriam_quotes.punchline: 'Sige, tayo na, Father of Four!'
Kapag sinabi sa iyo ng boyfriend mo na nanlalamig na siya sa iyo, buhusan mo ng gasolina at silaban mo.

miriam_quotes.setup: My management style?
miriam_quotes.punchline: Spiritual fortitude, intellectual scholarship, and, (smiling) if all else fails, physical violence might prove salutary.
